Sebulan Bekerja Ketua Fraksi PDI-P Sragen Sugiyamto Mengundurkan Diri, Ada Apa?
01 Nov 2019, 18:10 by Mulato Isha'an


Sebulan Bekerja Ketua Fraksi PDI-P Sragen Sugiyamto Mengundurkan Diri, Ada Apa?

KBRN Sragen: Ketua Fraksi Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan (PDI Perjuangan) Sragen Sugiyamto mengundurkan diri dari jabatannya. Pengunduran diri ini menjadi teka teki di kalangan masyarakat.Terlalu banyak jabatan dan tugas partai disebut-sebut menjadi alasannya mengundurkan diri. Sekretaris dewan Pimpinan Cabang (DPC) PDI Perjuangan Sragen Suparno tidak menampik adanya surat pengunduran diri dari Ketua Fraksi saat ini Sugiyamto.  "Aurat sudah disampaikan beberapa waktu lalu, namun belum ada rekomendasi. Sudah disampaikan ke DPP PDI Perjuangan. Namun belum ada keputusan soal nama pengganti posisinya," ungkap Suparno Jumat (1/11/2019).Disisi lain Suparno menolak menyebut nama yang akan mengisi jabatan tersebut. Politikus yang kini menjabat ketua DPRD Sragen itu menegaskan keputusan nama penggantinya akan disampaikan akhir November. Karena saat ini masih fokus pada pembahasan RAPBD Sragen karena berdampak langsung pada masyarakat. "Kita tunggu pembahasan (RAPBD 2020- red) selesai," ujarnya.Disinggung alasan pengunduran diri Sugiyamto, Suparno menjelaskan bahwa yang bersangkutan merasa tugasnya terlalu padat. Selain juga merasa tidak enak dengan anggota lain karana cukup banyak memegang jabatan. Selain itu juga disibukkan dengan usaha atau bisnisnya. "Jadi yang disampaikan memang cukup banyak beban jabatan yang disandang,  selain itu beliau juga struktural partai," jelasnya. Terpisah,  Sugiyamto membenarkan perihal pengunduran dirinya. Ia beralasan jabatan yang disandang cukup banyak, sehingga menyita waktu dan cukup menguras energi.  Sugiyamto mengakui selain didapuk menjadi ketua fraksi, juga menjadi bendahara DPC PDI Perjuangan, Ketua komisi IV serta anggota dua Badan yakni Badan Musyawarah (Bamus) dan Badan Anggaran (Banggar).  "Sudah bukan ketua Fraksi sebentar lagi,  surat pengunduran diri sebagai ketua fraksi sudah kami serahkan," jelasnya.

A month of work PDI-P faction chairman Sragen Sugiyamto resigns, what's wrong?
Nov 01 2019, 18:10 by Mulato Isha'an


A month of work PDI-P faction chairman Sragen Sugiyamto resigns, what's wrong?

KBRN Sragen: Chair of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDI Perjuangan) Faction Sragen Sugiyamto resigned from his position. This resignation becomes a puzzle in the community. Too many party positions and tasks are said to be the reason for resigning. Secretary of the PDI Perjuangan Branch Board (DPC) Sragen Suparno did not deny the existence of a letter of resignation from the current Chairman of the Faction Sugiyamto. "Aurat was conveyed some time ago, but there has been no recommendation. It has been submitted to the PDI Perjuangan DPP. But there has been no decision on the name to replace his position," said Suparno Friday (11/01/2019). the post. The politician who is now the chairman of the Sragen DPRD emphasized that the decision to replace his name will be submitted at the end of November. Because currently the focus is still on the discussion of the Sragen RAPBD because it has a direct impact on society. "We are waiting for the discussion (RAPBD 2020-ed) to be finished," he said. Regarding the reason for Sugiyamto's resignation, Suparno explained that he felt his task was too tight. Besides also feeling uneasy with other members because quite a lot of holding positions. Besides that, they are also busy with their business. "So what was conveyed was quite a lot of the burden of the position carried, besides that he was also a structural party," he explained. Separately, Sugiyamto confirmed his resignation. He reasoned that the position carried quite a lot, so that it took time and drained enough energy. Sugiyamto admitted that besides being lined up as the chair of the faction, he was also the treasurer of the DPC PDI Perjuangan, Chair of commission IV as well as members of two Bodies namely the Deliberation Board (Bamus) and the Budget Agency (Banggar). "It's no longer a faction chairman soon, we have submitted the resignation letter as the head of the faction," he explained.
